-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Convert JuicyPixel images into RGBA format, flip, trim and so on
--   
@package JuicyPixels-util
@version 0.2

module Codec.Picture.RGBA8
class ToPixelRGBA8 a
toRGBA8 :: ToPixelRGBA8 a => a -> PixelRGBA8
fromColorAndOpacity :: PixelRGB8 -> Image Pixel8 -> Image PixelRGBA8

-- | Note: Accessing out of the image causes a segfault.
trimImage :: Image PixelRGBA8 -> (Int, Int) -> (Int, Int) -> Image PixelRGBA8

-- | Note: Accessing out of the image causes a segfault.
patchImage :: Image PixelRGBA8 -> (Int, Int) -> Image PixelRGBA8 -> Image PixelRGBA8
flipVertically :: Image PixelRGBA8 -> Image PixelRGBA8
fromDynamicImage :: DynamicImage -> Image PixelRGBA8
readImageRGBA8 :: FilePath -> IO (Image PixelRGBA8)
addrImage :: Image PixelRGBA8 -> IO Int
instance ToPixelRGBA8 PixelRGBA8
instance ToPixelRGBA8 PixelRGB8
instance ToPixelRGBA8 PixelYA8
instance ToPixelRGBA8 Pixel8
